group.label: Shipment Defaults
group.comment: These settings will be used for automatic shipping label creation. If a label cannot be created with your configured defaults, the order must be processed manually. Use the Label Status column in the orders listing to identify those orders.

field.label: Send Shipper Address
field.button_label: If enabled, the Shipping Origin setting will be included with label requests. Otherwise the shipper address from the GLS account settings will be used.

field.label: Use ShopReturnService
field.comment: Preselect ShopReturnService for shipping label creation. Note that this service cannot be combined with LetterboxService.

field.label: Use LetterboxService
field.comment: Preselect LetterboxService for shipping label creation. Note that this service cannot be combined with ShopReturnService.
